title: Hour 1 – Mark Maske (07-07-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 – Mark Maske (07-07-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they discuss Patrick Mahomes’ new record breaking contract that makes him a Kansas City Chief for life. Washington Post NFL Reporter Mark Maske joins the show to tell the guys what the new name of the Redskins will be as they continue to face more pressure. They also talk about the struggles Major League Baseball is having with testing for the coronavirus.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
